title: Observatory Park - DU Campus - Dog Friendly - Hardwood - Avail 7/30
map_address: So Josephine Street near Asbury Ave
posting_body: 500 Sq-ft / 1 bedroom / 1 bath / Spacious living room with Hardwood Floors
Kitchen is complete with full refrigerator, electric range/oven, breakfast bar
Long counter and cabinets above and below two nice size closets in the hall
one for coats the other use as pantry/linen closet.
Laundry room on site / Parking when available $75.00 per month
Key code entrance to front and back doors of building.
Free shared WIFI / AC units in LR / Courtyard /
Residents pays unit electric + $75 flat building utility charge back
This building offers close proximity to many restaurants,
coffee shops, boutiques, local breweries and DU.
Observatory Park located .5 miles away or a evening at some amazing eateries
and bakeries right down the street.
Central location is key in the vibrant
city of Denver and transit is only a few minutes away from home.
Close proximity to Cherry Creek Mall and I-25.
Rent - $1150.00 per month - $1000.00 security deposit - $50 app fee each person
